name: EchinococcosisTestsForEchinococcusSpeciesAntibody
title: Echinococcosis (Tests for Echinococcus species Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Echinococcus species Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Echinococcus species Antibody),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
